content.description:
Nazi Poster, 1933

bpk Bildagentur / Art Resource, NY

Translation of text: “Then, as now, we remain comrades. German Labor Front.” The German Labor Front was a Nazi-controlled labor organization that replaced the various independent German labor unions in 1933.
content.question: The establishment of organizations like the German Labor Front is best explained as part of the Nazi Party’s program of

choices.label: provoking confrontation with other European states
